name: BENQI
challengeDesc: Compete in this biggest Web3 Hackathon and win $40,000 for the best product(s) built on-top of existing BENQI solutions.
benefitIntro: Our team has integrated the primary functions of BENQI into our Dashboards area.
benefit1: BENQI users will enjoy an optimal experience on mobile.
benefit2: Receive instant notifications of key account & platform events.
benefit3: Introduce new users to the BENQI platform.
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with BENQI.
